mapper.insert: insert into member(userid, userpwd, username, zipcode, addr, detailaddr, tel, smsok, email, emailok, regdate, lastdate, memstat) values(#{userid}, #{userpwd}, #{username}, #{zipcode}, #{addr}, #{detailaddr}, #{tel}, #{smsok}, #{email}, #{emailok}, sysdate, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select userid, username from member where userid=#{userid} and userpwd=#{userpwd} and memstat = 0
select count(*) from member where userid = #{userid}

select userid, username, email, tel, to_char(regdate, 'YY-MM-DD HH:MI') regdate, to_char(lastdate, 'YY-MM-DD HH:MI') lastdate, smsok, emailok, memstat from member
where ${searchCate} like '%${searchWord}%'
and emailok in ('Y','N')
and emailok = 'Y'
and emailok = 'N'
and smsok = 'Y'
and smsok = 'N'
order by userid desc
mapper.update: update member set lastdate = TO_DATE(#{param1},'YYYYMMDDHH24miss') where userid = #{param2}
update member set memstat = 1 where userid=#{param1}
